projects.name: Justin Leveritt
learnings: Designing a minimal, distraction-free experience to showcase content
Working with a framework coupled to a server and database (MongoDB)
Image optimization and ease-of-use for client updates

projects.name: Parkhub
projects.description: Admin dashboard for mobile parking platform
learnings: Simplifying UI while representing large amounts of real-time data

projects.name: Flexdrive
projects.description: Administrative portal for the Flexdrive platform
learnings: Two unique portals, both consuming webpack build & UI-kit as dependencies
UI-kit provides reusable components, redux modules, styles, and utils
Mapbox integration for mapping vehicle's locations
